amendment.description: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part C of House Report 117-325 to replace the bill's text with a new text that would reauthorize the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act for six years.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to replace the bill's text with a new text that would reauthorize the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act for six years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller-Meeks amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 174 - 241 (Roll no. 191).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A005) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mrs. Miller-Meeks.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Miller-Meeks amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 174 - 241 (Roll no. 191).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller-Meeks amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 174 - 241 (Roll no. 191).
